messages.title: A Record of Delivery, A Promise of More
Building a stronger economy and a fairer society, creating opportunity for everyone.
messages.content: Nick Perry is committed to building a stronger economy and a fairer society, where everyone has the opportunity to get on in life.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick promises no government borrowing for spending when the economy is growing.
Nick will press firms to offer apprenticeships to local young people.
Nick will demand better local health services and mental health care.
Nick will support for our schools so that every child gets the best start in life.
Nick will continue to fight against unacceptable development in the constituency.
Nick will support low and middle earners by further raising the tax-free allowance.

issues.economy: Nick Perry is focused on creating jobs locally and supports local firms to offer apprenticeships to the youth. He emphasizes no government borrowing for spending when the economy is growing.
issues.education: Nick Perry supports schools to ensure every child gets the best start in life.
issues.environment: Nick Perry has fought against unacceptable development and will continue to do so.
issues.health: Nick Perry demands better local health services and works for improved mental health care.

housing.content: Nick Perry has fought against unacceptable development in the constituency.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought unacceptable development; Worked for better local health services; Pressed firms on apprenticeships

images.caption: Nick Perry at various local events
Nick Perry engaging with the community
